TopicTitle: Looking for a playtester for some Rover contracts

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm working on a contract pack for Contract Configurator for Rovers.  I need a few people who would be willing to install a single cfg file to test these rover contracts.

Any volunteers?

Thanks

LGG
Fire away. I could use a reason to use rovers in my space program.
Thread has been moved to Add-On Discussions.

12 minutes ago, PT said:

Fire away. I could use a reason to use rovers in my space program.

Great.  I'm waiting for the next release of Contract Configurator, should be out in a day or so.  It fixes a bug I found which is preventing the contracts from working properly.

Thanks
